definition: illness having to do with obstruction of urine flow/(Chinese medicine)/retention of urine
to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effects of planning of nursing based on differential diagnosis of TCM on postoperative dysuria patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨解除术后癃闭病人的有效护理方法。

sentences.english: Conclusions Longbitong capsule is effective drug to treat BPH.
sentences.chinese: 结论癃闭通胶囊为治疗BPH有效药品。

definition: blocked or painful urination, constipation and vomiting (Chinese medicine)

localized pain disorder (in Chinese medicine)/arthralgia syndrome/bi disorder
condition characterized by thirst, hunger, frequent urination and weight loss, identified in TCM with type 2 diabetes
